typeDescription.name: edu.umn.biomedicus.type.CharWindow
typeDescription.description: This is a window of characters. It is convenient to have window annotations to use in combination with other annotators (e.g., tokenizers).

featureDescription.name: preview
featureDescription.description: The characters that follow the target character in the given window.

featureDescription.name: review
featureDescription.description: The characters previous to the target character in the given window.

featureDescription.name: targetIndex
featureDescription.description: The index of the target character. This is useful for downstream annotators that are adding new annotations to the target character (e.g., symbol disambiguation).
